data.name: MorphVOX Pro - City Backgrounds
data.detailed_description:
Have fun and add the sounds of the urban world to MorphVOX Voice Changer.

City Backgrounds adds the ability to disguise your location when using MorphVOX Voice Changer. Sound like you are at the airport or in a cafe or at the amusement park.

This DLC has been digitally dove-tailed for optimal playback quality. City Backgrounds easily integrates with MorphVOX Voice Changing Software.

data.short_description: City Backgrounds allows you to disguise your location . Sound like you are at the airport or in a cafe or at the amusement park.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium IV 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 5 MB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or greater
  • Memory: 5 MB RAM
